resources.string:
We're going to play a game with your chastity. We throw these two dice. If you get a double, congratulations - you may unlock. If not - too bad. You have to wait a day before you can try again.

But if you throw a one, you have to wait for the number of days as shown on the other die.

Unless you throw a double one. Then you have to wait a week before asking.


Click the go button when you're ready to start.
You started playing X days ago,
